title: How to Unsubscribe from Kyivstar TV
description: This guide provides several methods to cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription as of February 20, 2026. Choose the method that is most convenient for you.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Web Portal
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via the web portal:

*   Go to the My Kyivstar web portal (account.kyivstar.ua).
*   Log in using your phone number.

steps_2.title: Unsubscribe via Phone (USSD Code)
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via USSD code:

*   Dial *244*6# or *303*8# on your phone and press the call button.
*   Wait for an SMS confirmation of cancellation.

steps_3.title: Unsubscribe via Phone (Customer Support)
steps_3.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription by contacting customer support:

*   Call Customer Support at 466 (free within the Kyivstar network) or 0 800 300 466 (from other networks).

steps_4.title: Unsubscribe via Google Play
steps_4.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via Google Play:

*   Open the Google Play app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Select "Payments & subscriptions" and then "Subscriptions".
*   Find Київстар ТБ in the list and tap "Cancel subscription".

steps_5.title: Unsubscribe via iOS Settings
steps_5.description:
To cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription via iOS Settings:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name at the top.
*   Select "Subscriptions" (or "Media & Purchases" if you don't see it).
*   Find Київстар ТБ and tap "Cancel Subscription".

seo_text: Cancel Kyivstar TV subscription, unsubscribe Kyivstar TV, Kyivstar TV cancellation guide, Kyivstar TV billing, Kyivstar TV manage subscription, Kyivstar TV auto-renewal, Kyivstar TV how to cancel, Kyivstar TV subscription.
